5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: ‘Uqbah bin ‘Amir Al-Juhani said:“When the following was revealed: ‘So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most Great’,[69:52] the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to us: ‘Say this in your Ruku’.’ And when the following was revealed: ‘Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High.’[87:1] the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to us: ‘Say this in your prostrations.’”

chapter.eng-name: Tasbih (glorifying Allah) when bowing and prostrating
